r.d: Provides bindings to the functions of libssh2 which implements the SSH2 protocol. libssh2 is available from http:/libssh2.org/
r.n: - Fixed bug #9500, SSH2 sockets not being closed properly because of close vs closesocket difference - Fixed Windows support - Support for latest libssh2 release - Fix build with PHP 5.3 - Fixed incorrect return values for rename/unlink/mkdir/rmdir with sftp functions/streams - Fixed various memory leaks and segfaults
